abstract: jurgen klopp refuses to quash philippe coutinho exit talk as barcelona move edges closer .
article: liverpool have admitted defeat in their attempts to persuade him to ignore the overtures of the catalansjurgen klopp has refused to dampen speculation that philippe coutinho is heading for the anfield exit . liverpool have admitted defeat in their attempts to persuade him to ignore the overtures of barcelona , after he made clear he will not agree a new , improved contract because he has set his heart on a move to the nou camp . however , klopp remained tight-lipped when quizzed on negotiations during his pre-match press conference on thursdayhe aid : `` all the things i could say now would only create stories , i have nothing to say .

it 's a transfer window . getty images europe `` nothing i could say now would help me , the player or the club . `` there is now an understanding within the nou camp that they could get their man if they conduct negotiations seriously and sensitively . that means no repeat of last summer 's crass attempts to prise the player out of anfield at a knock-down price and also a serious , achievable fee which does not include the unlikely performance-related add-ons proposed in august . liverpool make transfer approach for monaco star thomas lemarafp .
